A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sorry\, but as a fan of Sci Fi and Star Wars in particular\, this was the worst entry into the franchise for fans. It basically takes everything that fans love of the old movies and throws it in the trash. It then takes the most interesting plots from Force Awakens and throws it in the trash. What we're left with is a social and political commentary on wealth distribution and the military industrial complex. This isn't inherently a bad thing\, but it doesn't mesh well with Star Wars. Would anyone actually be happy if Star Wars ended all Wars in the galaxy far far away?
